participant_1.background:

I once went to the Amazon rainforest and saw a sloth in the wild.
i work in finance.
i recently had a private lunch with will ferrell.

participant_2.background:
I played fetch with my black lab in the park today.
I do laundry every other week, but I wish I could do it more often.
I took some time off to travel and explore my interests.
i like to race go carts.
my hobbies include photography and hiking.

content.text: Great! I recently had a private lunch with Will Ferrell.
Yeah, he was really nice. We talked about his new movie and he gave me some advice on my career.
That's awesome. I'm glad you had a good experience.
Thanks! I'm also trying to think of a way to advertise my juicing bar to people in my neighborhood. Any ideas?
You could try putting up flyers or handing out coupons. You could also partner with local businesses to offer discounts to their customers.
That's a good idea, thanks! I'll definitely look into that.
No problem! What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to go hiking and photography. I also like to play video games.
That's cool. I love hiking too! I've been trying to get into photography, but I'm not very good at it.
It takes a lot of practice, but it's a lot of fun.
Yeah, I'll keep practicing. What video games do you like to play?
I like to play a lot of different games, but I'm really into Fortnite right now.
I've heard good things about that game. I've never played it though.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
Maybe I will. Thanks for the recommendation.
